title: Drawing, "Ascension of the Virgin", 1750–1800
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: At the bottom is a group of angels lifting the Virgin. Christ and donor (?), raising a crown together, are shown in clouds above.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Ascension of the Virgin", 1750–1800.
1750–1800. Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-6477.
